name: mcp-servers-collection
description: A collection of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for AI assistants

scripts.install-all: cd customer-mcp-server && npm install && cd ../hrm-mcp-server && npm install
scripts.build-all: cd customer-mcp-server && npm run build && cd ../hrm-mcp-server && npm run build
scripts.docker-build-all: cd customer-mcp-server && docker build -t customer-mcp-server . && cd ../hrm-mcp-server && docker build -t hrm-mcp-server .

author: MCP Demo Collection
